translations: 泻药；通便药物；[药]轻泻剂（laxative 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Foods that ferment quickly in the stomach are excellent natural laxatives.
sentences.translation: 在胃里快速发酵的食物是极好的天然泻药。

sentences.sentence: Today, I was at home with slight constipation, so I took two laxatives.
sentences.translation: 今天在家的时候，我觉得有些便秘，就吃了两颗通便的药。

sentences.sentence: She has also been seen hitting all-night drugstores, shopping for laxatives.
sentences.translation: 还被看到去通宵药店买泻药。
